subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Mustapha Farrakhan scored a career-high 23 points and Mike Scott had 17 points and 12 rebounds to lead visiting Virginia to an 87-79 victory over No. 15 Minnesota (6-1).
snippet: Mustapha Farrakhan scored a career-high 23 points and Mike Scott had 17 points and 12 rebounds to lead visiting Virginia to an 87-79 victory over No. 15 Minnesota (6-1).
